ur_rna.RNAstructureUI.ui

Class Dialogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.RNAstructureUI.ui.Dialogs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Dialogs
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that handles simple dialogs used in the RNAstructure GUI.

      • htmlCenter

        public static java.lang.String htmlCenter(java.lang.String msg)
        Converts a simple text message to an html-formatted message by prepending <html><center> and escaping all html special characters within the message. However if the message already starts with <html>, it is returned as-is.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to convert to HTML

        Returns:
